scripts.prebuild: if [ ! -f hugo ]; then echo 'Installing Hugo v0.157.0...'; curl -sSL https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases/download/v0.157.0/hugo_extended_0.157.0_linux-amd64.tar.gz -o hugo.tar.gz && tar -xzf hugo.tar.gz && rm hugo.tar.gz; fi && if ! command -v go > /dev/null; then echo 'Installing Go...'; curl -sSL https://go.dev/dl/go1.21.0.linux-amd64.tar.gz | tar -C /usr/local -xz; export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin; fi
